attributes.action: To make Cervical Screening tests more regular testing once a year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
please join our petition we want cervical cancer screening testing to be more regular at least once a year as opposed to every 3 years as to much can happen in a 3 year span so much can develop befor you realize you may be in trouble.

jade goody was let down by our nhs and hopefully with regular screening every year we can help prevent more unnecessary deaths.
